name: Elias Ladopoulos
title: Our Notes
knownFor: Co-founder of the Legion of Doom hacking collective (as “Acid Phreak”)
contributions: Advocated for ethical hacking, digital rights, and the cultural codex of early cyberpunk
bio: Ladopoulos' transition from underground hacker to legit defender of networks is a prototype for ZZX-Labs: rogue knowledge refined into national defense, privacy tech, and cyber ethics architecture.
